sentences.en: All these ligneous plants are imported from Russia.
sentences.cn: 这些木本植物都是从俄国进口而来。

sentences.en: Description: Evergreen, ligneous, large lianas; stems twisted.
sentences.cn: 形态特徵: 常绿 、 木质藤本; 茎扭旋.

sentences.en: Dinner is prepared in such kitchen, eyeful is natural feeling, still can smell it seems that nature ligneous faint scent, a kind of pastoral feeling arises spontaneously.
sentences.cn: 在这样的厨房筹备晚餐，满眼都是自然的感觉，似乎还能闻到大自然木质的清香，一种田园生活的感觉便油然而生。

sentences.en: Fibreboard of wood or other ligneous materials, whether or not bonded with resins or other organic substances.
sentences.cn: 木纤维板或其他木质材料纤维板，不论是否用树脂或其他有机粘合剂粘合。

sentences.en: Sofa can be cloth art , cany, bamboo is ligneous , should sit comfortably only good - looking.
sentences.cn: 沙发可以是布艺的 、 藤制的 、 竹木制的, 只要坐得舒适又好看.

sentences.en: The rice husk is a ligneous hard layer of the cereal with high silicate content.
sentences.cn: 稻壳灰是具有高硅酸盐含量的谷类的一种木质的硬层。
